nhc_headline: ...LIFE-THREATENING STORM SURGE, DAMAGING WINDS AND FLOODING  RAINFALL OVERSPREADING SOUTHEASTERN TEXAS FROM BERYL...
summary:
...LIFE-THREATENING STORM SURGE, DAMAGING WINDS AND FLOODING  RAINFALL OVERSPREADING SOUTHEASTERN TEXAS FROM BERYL...
 As of 7:00 AM CDT Mon Jul 8
 the center of Beryl was located near 29.2, -95.8
 with movement N at 12 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 980 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 75 mph.
